I do have a good eye but believe me, the advertising was on point! It came in exactly as seen in the advertisement.  While the quality is not surprisingly only good, not great, it was a hit at the dinner. I would buy from this seller again. The hubster is 5’10” and weighs about 208 lbs.  We went with the large and it was almost perfect. When I shop for him at Nordstrom’s or local gentlemen boutiques, I pay $250-$600 for jackets or more but I have realized that you don’t have to do that. Just jump right up here on Amazon, do your due diligence research and save tons of money!
